thread.title: Your top 10 comments after LSU's win over EMU | Tell us in 10 words
thread.title_full: Your top 10 comments after LSU's win over EMU | Tell us in 10 words | NOLA.com

author: John Roach, NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune
title: Your top 10 comments after LSU's win over EMU | Tell us in 10 words
text:
Ron Higgins nailed it in his analysis of LSU's win over Eastern Michigan Saturday. "Sans running back Leonard Fournette's historic third straight 200-yard rushing performance, not much seemed in rhythm for LSU in its 44-22 victory Saturday night."
You agreed. Here are the top 10 comments from our request to "Tell us in 10 words" about the game.
TallCat78: First two series were great. Still much to be desired.
zone1221 : over confident; sloppy; overrated; TGIF (thank God it's Fournette carrying)
Boudreaux Jones: So much for working on the passing game. Oy vey.
Air2Data: Once again, playing DOWN to their opponent; must be coaching!
Bill: Fournette, Fournette. Fournette, Fournette, Fournette, Fournette, Fournette, Fournette, Fournette, Fournette
Aunt Mulva: Oh how I miss Odell Beckham Junior and Jarvis Landry.
CRJ2: Can't win the SEC playing like this, absolutely no way.
desron6 : They'll be exposed by the real teams on their schedule.
Tezopine: Stop calling low percentage long pass plays that go incomplete.
Ozonator: Really?! After last week's game, Tigers have yet to improve.
